Megatron:





"Ah, excellent, yess." Megatron said to KitKat. "Another bot to join the 
Predacon cause. And no better time as well. I shall speak to him about his 
weapon, yess." He looked over to Quickstrike who had his head ducked. His 
crimson optics looked groggy than their agressive glow.

"Is there something wrong, Quickstrike?"

"Uuh, no." he replied. "Ah just ain't been feelin' like mahself."

>::KitKat::
>
>She walked into the base.  She saw Megatron standing there in beast
>mode. She spoke up with a cheerfull voice.
>"Commander Megatron.  I have brought with me a bot who wishes to
>serve you.  he has brought with him a great weapon.  A gun type that
>I have never seen before. I hope you will be pleased."
